HOTSITE.subtitulo: Because you too can be reborn.
HOTSITE.quem_s: For whom was the FÃªnix made?
HOTSITE.quem_s1: Our system is based on the help of those who are on the margins of society, in the search for new experiences in the labor market from the register of their curricula. Opening a new range of opportunities for your life.
HOTSITE.faca: MAKE YOUR CURRICULUM FOR FREE AND EASILY
HOTSITE.faca_t: Here you can set up your resume, both on the computer and on the cell phone, without any preconceptions for your hiring.
HOTSITE.fale_t: We make it easy for contractors to find you easily if you are interested in joining the job market.
HOTSITE.conect_t: Platform available in several languages, enabling greater integration between companies and stakeholders around the world, thus breaking down barriers and allowing anyone to be hired.
